meanings.definition: A person who is new to a skill or activity.
meanings.sent1: Beginners often feel nervous when trying something for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The beginners in the art class were eager to learn how to paint.
meanings.sent3: The beginners in the cooking class accidentally used salt instead of sugar, creating a salty cake.
meanings.sent4: Watching the beginners play the piano was like witnessing the birth of music.
meanings.sent5: The beginners' excitement was contagious as they embarked on their learning journey.

meanings.definition: Those who are inexperienced or just starting out.
meanings.sent1: The beginners in the soccer team were still learning the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: Beginners in gardening may need guidance on how to care for plants.
meanings.sent3: The beginners in the dance class tripped over each other, creating a funny chaos.
meanings.sent4: The beginners in photography captured the world with fresh eyes and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The beginners' enthusiasm was evident as they took their first steps in the new hobby.
